name: Dragon Bowl
overview: Did you ever ask yourself what it would be like if you took the exact gameplay of Tecmo’s arcade beat-em-up Ninja Gaiden, replaced all the graphics with ridiculous cartoonish animals and environments, downgraded the music, and let you play as Son Goku? Quit lying, you never thought that—but clearly someone in Korea did, for in 1992 Nics released Dragon Bowl in Korea.
